name: The Arsonist's Trial By fire
description: Ever wanted to set yourself on fire and kill monsters with your own body? No? I don't care! Get out there and set everyone ablaze! This is a short prototype level of a roguelike idea I got from the Trijam I particiapted in. Art, sounds, and programming were done by me. Music was created a few years ago by my friend Smathrar. Her work is available at https://smathrar.bandcamp.com/.
